description: Lucas Knight lays on his bed during the last vestiges of Summer, thinking of the season that has passed so quickly. He longs to recapture the careless feeling of long days and warm nights. He sends a message to Johnny Torque, asking him if he'd like one last fling before the Fall descends. Johnny is right over. Walking through the door, their eyes lock, their lips meet, and the long drudgery of the coming winter seem far, far away.Enjoy!
title: One Last Time
